```{r MK_test_as_function}
mk_test = function(dat){
  dat %>% 
    reframe(MK_results = kendallTrendTest(value ~ Year)[c('statistic','p.value','estimate')]) %>%
    unnest(MK_results) %>%
    unnest_longer(col = MK_results) %>%
    group_by(name) %>%
    mutate(MK_results_id = c('Statistic','P_value','Tau','Slope','Intercept')) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = MK_results_id, values_from = MK_results) %>%
    mutate(trend_sig = fcase(
      abs(Tau) <= 0.05 , "No Trend",
      Tau < -0.05 & P_value < 0.05 & name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY'), "Significant Trend Earlier",
      Tau < -0.05 & P_value >= 0.05 & name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY'), "Non-Significant Trend Earlier",
      Tau > 0.05 & P_value >= 0.05 & name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY'), "Non-Significant Trend Later",
      Tau > 0.05 & P_value < 0.05 & name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY'), "Significant Trend Later",
      Tau < -0.05 & P_value < 0.05 & (!name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY')), "Significant Trend Down",
      Tau < -0.05 & P_value >= 0.05 & (!name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY')), "Non-Significant Trend Down",
      Tau > 0.05 & P_value >= 0.05 & (!name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY')), "Non-Significant Trend Up",
      Tau > 0.05 & P_value < 0.05 & (!name %in% c('DoY_50pct_TotalQ','Min_7_Day_DoY')), "Significant Trend Up"
    )) %>% 
    ungroup()
}
```


```{r make_printout_elements, fig.height=10}

for(i in 1:nrow(stations[c(1:5),])){

main_leaf = leaflet() %>%

  addCircleMarkers(color = ~'blue',
                   fillColor = 'blue',
                   fillOpacity = 0.5,
                   data = stations) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(color = 'red',
                   fillColor = 'red',
                   fillOpacity = 0.5,
                   label = ~paste0(STATION_NAME, ', ',STATION_NUMBER),
                   labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = T,
                                               offset = c(-10,0)),
                   data = this_station) %>% 
  addMiniMap(
    tiles = leaflet_provider_choice,
    position = 'topright',
    width = 200, 
    height = 200,
    toggleDisplay = FALSE
  ) %>% 
  setView(lng = station_coords$X, 
          lat = station_coords$Y, 
          zoom = 8) %>% 
  addScaleBar('bottomright') %>% 
  addLegend(colors = c('red','blue'),
            labels = c('This Station','Other Stations'))

name_of_main_leaf = paste0('mainleaf_station_',this_station$STATION_NAME,'_',this_station$STATION_NUMBER,'.png')
path_of_main_leaf = paste0(here::here(), "/print_ver/factsheet_figures/",name_of_main_leaf)

mapview::mapshot(x = main_leaf,

# Create table =================================================================

summary_2010 = this_dat %>% 
  filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  summarise(across(-c(STATION_NUMBER,Year,Month), mean,na.rm=T)) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(Mean,Median,Min_7_Day,Min_30_Day), ~ paste0(round(.x,1),' m^3/s'))) %>% 
  mutate(Total_Volume_m3 = paste0(round(Total_Volume_m3,0), ' m3')) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(DoY_50pct_TotalQ,Min_7_Day_DoY,Min_30_Day_DoY), ~ as.character(round(.x,0)))) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = 'Parameter', values_to = 'Parameter Average') %>% 
  mutate(Parameter = case_when(
    Parameter == 'Mean' ~ 'Mean Flow',
    Parameter == 'Median' ~ 'Median Flow',
    Parameter == 'DoY_50pct_TotalQ' ~ 'Day of Year of 50% Annual Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_7_Day_DoY' ~ 'Day of Year of 7-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_7_Day' ~ '7-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_30_Day_DoY' ~ 'Day of Year of 30-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_30_Day' ~ '30-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Total_Volume_m3' ~ 'Total Annual Flow',
  )) %>% 
  rename('2010 to Present' = Parameter)

summary_all = this_dat %>% 
  summarise(across(-c(STATION_NUMBER,Year,Month), mean,na.rm=T)) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(Mean,Median,Min_7_Day,Min_30_Day), ~ paste0(round(.x,1),' m^3/s'))) %>% 
  mutate(Total_Volume_m3 = paste0(round(Total_Volume_m3,0), ' m3')) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(DoY_50pct_TotalQ,Min_7_Day_DoY,Min_30_Day_DoY), ~ as.character(round(.x,0)))) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = 'Parameter', values_to = 'Parameter Average') %>% 
  mutate(Parameter = case_when(
    Parameter == 'Mean' ~ 'Mean Flow',
    Parameter == 'Median' ~ 'Median Flow',
    Parameter == 'DoY_50pct_TotalQ' ~ 'Day of Year of 50% Annual Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_7_Day_DoY' ~ 'Day of Year of 7-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_7_Day' ~ '7-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_30_Day_DoY' ~ 'Day of Year of 30-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Min_30_Day' ~ '30-Day Low Flow',
    Parameter == 'Total_Volume_m3' ~ 'Total Annual Flow',
  )) %>% 
  rename('All Available Years' = Parameter)

  flextable::flextable(cwidth = 2) %>%

# Create charts ================================================================

## 1. Line graphs of mean flow over two time-scales.

variable_to_plot = 'Mean'

# Perform Mann-Kendall trend analysis on 2010 - present data.
mk_results_2010 = this_dat %>% 
  filter(Month == 'All') %>%
  filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-c(Year,STATION_NUMBER,Month)) %>% 
  group_by(STATION_NUMBER,name) %>% 
  mk_test() %>% 
  filter(name == variable_to_plot)
  
# Join MK test results to the 2010-present day dataset.
mk_line_2010 = this_dat %>% 
  filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  filter(Month == 'All') %>%
  dplyr::select(Year,STATION_NUMBER,Mean) %>% 
  cbind(mk_results_2010 %>% 
          dplyr::select(-STATION_NUMBER)) %>% 
  group_by(Year,STATION_NUMBER) %>% 
  summarise(SlopePreds = Intercept+Slope*Year)

# Subset our total dataset for just 2010-present. Used to plot line.
this_line_2010 = this_dat %>% 
  filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  filter(Month == 'All')

# As above, but now for total dataset.
# Perform Mann-Kendall trend test.

mk_results_all = this_dat %>% 
  filter(Month == 'All') %>%
  # filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-c(Year,STATION_NUMBER,Month)) %>% 
  group_by(STATION_NUMBER,name) %>% 
  mk_test() %>% 
  filter(name == variable_to_plot)

# Join MK test results for all data to all data.

  # filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  filter(Month == 'All') %>%
  dplyr::select(Year,STATION_NUMBER,Mean) %>% 
  cbind(mk_results_all %>% 
          dplyr::select(-STATION_NUMBER)) %>% 
  group_by(Year,STATION_NUMBER) %>% 
  summarise(SlopePreds = Intercept+Slope*Year)
  
# Subset of all data for line.
this_line_all = this_dat %>% 
  # filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  filter(Month == 'All')

p_2010 = ggplot() + 
  geom_line(aes(y = SlopePreds,
                x = Year),
            linewidth = 2,
            col = 'darkblue',
            alpha = 0.4,
            data = mk_line_2010) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Mean, 
                x = Year),
            linewidth = 1,
            col = 'skyblue',
            data = this_line_2010) +
  labs(y = paste0(variable_to_plot," Flow (m<sup>3</sup>/s)"),
       title = "2010 to Present",
       caption = paste0(mk_results_all$trend_sig, " (P-value ~ ",round(mk_results_all$P_value,2),")")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_markdown(),
        legend.position = 'none')

p_all = ggplot() + 
  geom_line(aes(y = SlopePreds,
                x = Year),
            linewidth = 2,
            col = 'darkblue',
            alpha = 0.4,
            data = mk_line_all) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Mean, 
                x = Year),
            linewidth = 1,
            col = 'skyblue',
            data = this_line_all) +
  labs(y = paste0(variable_to_plot," Flow (m<sup>3</sup>/s)"),
       title = "All Available Data",
       caption = paste0(mk_results_all$trend_sig, " (P-value ~ ",round(mk_results_all$P_value,2),")")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_markdown(),
        legend.position = 'none')
```
